sources.autograph: No MSS. of any kind are known.
sources.first_edition: 1798, Paris, Pleyel: Op. 40 no. 5 (for title and comment, see No. 240)
sources.modern_edition: 1960, Hamburg, Simrock, in the series Das Streichquartett (vol. ii no. 1): Op. 40 no. 5 (separate parts; revised by W. Höckner and H. Mlynarczyk)

entries.notes: quartettino... opera piccola in Boccherini's autograph catalogue
opera grande in Boccherini's autograph catalogue

partial_notes: Boccherini and Pleyel proves beyond any doubt that the present Opus is a series of original works unconnected with Artaria Op. 32. Arrangement: Of the whole quartet, as a part of a guitar quintet, by Boccherini himself (see No. 450).
